name: Get Those Commies Off The Green!
name_original: Get Those Commies Off The Green!
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a billionaire? Me too. I've heard it involves a lot of golfing and punching down on the working class. Now you too can partake on the billionaire experience with Get These Commies Off The Green!

In the year 2025, you step into the shoes of Aaron McRandy: Part time oil magnate, part time amateur golf champion at the local country club. One day while he's enjoying a peaceful afternoon of his favorite past time, he watches in horror as a group of tree-hugging, communist sympathizers infiltrate the hallowed grounds of the Golf Course trying to turn it into free housing and productive organic farms that blend seamlessly with local biodiversity.

DISGUSTING!

Everyone else decided to go home and leave them be. Not you. You will not let these people gentrify your ten million dollar playground. No assault from the coastal elites, innocent deer and the structurally unemployed will keep you away from your goals. You're going to keep playing no matter the cost to your wallet, the city, or the planet. After all, only you can afford it.

Help Andy Randy use the power of capitalism, the state, and incredible violence to defeat these America-hating pinkos and get that trophy.

Featuring:
  • Golfing!
  • A.R.S.O.N!
  • Golf-Based Violence
  • Lots of Violence
  • Political satire
  • Many kinds of enemies to beat up
  • Dynamic Obstacle and Enemy spawning system
  • Pollution!
  • Environmentalist Politics!
  • Capitalism!
  • A secret mini boss

The game is currently just a prototype concept and is free to play. The final version of the game is in development and will not be free to play.

Game's Website: https://josephyong5.wixsite.com/my-site

(The game is still under construction but we're just giving it some final touches)

The Dev Team:
  • Daniel - Producer, Programmer, Writer, Game Designer, Voice Actor (Aaron McRandy (trailer)
  • Emmanuel Dega - Artist, Animator, Programmer
  • Murley - UI Developer, Voice Actor (The enemies, Aaron McRandy in gameplay), Level Designer, Programmer
  • Joseph Yong - Programmer, Video editor, Project manager, Website Developer
  • Emmanuel Sarnas - Programmer, Assistant Artist
  • Rayjay - Programmer
